name: Tomb Raider I
description:
This script will install "Tomb Raider I Gold" Gog edition with strong graphics improvements.
During install please let all options by default.
This script uses different projects:
GLRage: https://github.com/ata4/glrage
TombATI: http://www.glidos.net/tombati.html
HD textures packs: http://www.tombraiderxtra.com/
other sources: https://www.tombraiderforums.com
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- When the "Tomb Raider Importer" dialog box will appear, just click "install". 
- Add levels from TR1 Gold edition
- TR1 has insufficient controller support, I invite you to use a keymapper. You will find profiles for x360 (Antimicro) and Steam Controller (sc-controller) in the "gamepad profiles" folder.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.installer: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG

task.description: When the "Tomb Raider Importer" will appear, just click "install".
task.name: wineexec

content:
custom-name: Tomb Raider I Gold
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG
- tombati:
    filename: TombATI_v1.7.rar
    url: http://download.glidos.net/TombATI/TombATI_v1.7.exe
- hdtextures:
    filename: TombATI_HD_Textures_v1.0.rar
    url: http://download.glidos.net/TombATI/TombATI_HD_Textures_v1.0.exe
- trubpcx: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%201/TITLEHTR1UB.PCX
- menu1: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%201/TOMBATIM1.BAT
- menu2: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%201/TOMBATIM2.BAT
- gppx360: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%201/gamepad%20profiles/tr1-2_x360.gamecontroller.amgp
- gppsteam: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%201/gamepad%20profiles/tr1-2_steam.sccprofile
- gppreadme: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%201/gamepad%20profiles/tr1-2_gamepad_readme.html
- wpp: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%201/tr1.bmp
game:
  exe: drive_c/TOMBATI/TOMBATIM1.BAT
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Running Setup, please wait...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/
    file: tombati
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/TR1HD/
    file: hdtextures
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/
    src: menu1
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/
    src: menu2
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppx360
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppsteam
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppreadme
- task:
    app: vcrun2015
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ddraw
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: winmm
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
- task:
    description: When the "Tomb Raider Importer" will appear, just click "install".
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/TombRaiderImporter.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/DATA/TITLEHTR1.PCX
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/DATA/TITLEH.PCX
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/DATA
    src: trubpcx
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    src: wpp
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: wallpaper
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\tr1.bmp
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: GradientActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 255 179 102
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/INSTALL.BAT
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/shortcutJS.bat
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/vc_redist.x86.exe
wine:
  Desktop: true
